nodes.bodyText: I think nextFormNumber.substring(4, 5) should be   nextFormNumber.substring(4) instead. Consider a form with two digit steps e.g. step10 for example.
Can this be simplified to formNumber = currentFormNumber > 0 ? currentFormNumber : 1 since a step is not expected to ever be negative?

@bennsimon any idea why the skip blank step logic still doesn't work for JsonFormFragments? Seems related to this code being removed and moved to JsonWizardFormFragmentPresenter https://github.com/OpenSRP/opensrp-client-native-form/pull/407/files#diff-026e337bf5459fc5eee13061b659364e67ba948390ac996edef6fb3feae6ca3dR53.

nodes.bodyText:
This validation logic may not be necessary after this merges #476.
This count can be retrieved from the count object.
Any reason for changing the method signature? This is a public method which could be called elsewhere.
Not clear what this does, please add a comment or move to a descriptive method.
Is this skip logic only relevant to wizard forms? Could it also be useful in other forms and in that case better placed in the JsonFormFragment?
What is this doing? Please add a comment.
This is a public method. Changing method signature is a possible breaking change.

This is a public method. Changing method signature is a possible breaking change.
Is this a major version change? If so, please ignore all such comments.

Merge pull request #495 from OpenSRP/tt-oct-6-2020-jsonformpresenter

add tests
update repeating grp done action with new logic
fix code when updating the repeating grp count
Display progress dialog as fields are being fetched
Initialize calculations on a background thread
hide text view on the UI thread
iterate on array or keys to avoid concurrent modification
Preload the rules files defined in a step as form loads
use an array incase map is changes; log warning if view is null
Generic popup dialog load form elements on ViewCreated so that expension panel loads views once
Preload rules on the generic popup dialog
Remove methods already executed in superclass onCreate
return if form fragment has been detached
Extract step in main thread. return if fragment has been detached
stop if form fragment has been detached
Use conceurrent hash map to allow access from different threads
Halt processing if popup is detached
relevance run rules for current step only
Process skip steps logic after relevance has been applied
Stop loops when criteria is found
Use a map to avoid looping through all the fields
Add popup widgets to form widgets map
refresh multi media skip if key is blank
add widgets on create if dialog is created; add on createView method
Pass step to refresh media logic
load subform after main form fileds and load of secondary values
Create GPS dialog on UI thread
add logic to execute refreshlogic on date picker selected in NativeRadioBtn
